## Data
Use the `gapminder` dataset.

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
theme_set(theme_minimal(base_size = 14))
```

```{r student-plot}
# Write your code here
```

```{r solution}
ggplot(gapminder, aes(year, lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.6) +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Life expectancy")
```
